<title level="1" pfs="">[Tanesse Fleer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2101)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 36

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Tanesse Fleer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2101)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 16</row>

**Perception** +19

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +19, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +17, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +16, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +17, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +19, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +17

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Chain Shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [hand crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69)_ (2, 20 bolts), [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +16 

**Will** +10 

</row>

**HP** 155

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> Tanessa can make Attacks of Opportunity with a loaded ranged weapon she's wielding if the triggering creature is within 5 feet of her.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet; mobility

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortsword +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+10 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_hand crossbow_ +20 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 2d6+10 piercing

**Hunt Prey** <actions string="Single Action" />  Tanessa designates as her prey a single creature that she can see and hear or that she is [Tracking](/Actions.aspx?ID=66). She gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks when she [Seeks](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) her prey and a +2 circumstance bonus to [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) checks when she Tracks her prey. She also ignores the penalty for making ranged attacks within her second range increment against her prey. Lastly, she deals 1d8 precision damage to her prey the first time she hits her prey each round. Tanessa can have only one prey designated at a time.

**Incredible Reload** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirement** Tanessa has a hand crossbow in each hand; **Effect** Tanessa quickly juggles her hand crossbows from one hand to another, reloading them both as she does so.

**Mobile Shot Stance**   Tanessa's ranged Strikes don't trigger Attacks of Opportunity or other reactions triggered by ranged attacks.

</column>
name: Tanesse Fleer

She gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks when she Seeks her prey and a +2 circumstance bonus to Survival checks when she Tracks her prey. She also ignores the penalty for making ranged attacks within her second range increment against her prey. Lastly, she deals 1d8 precision damage to her prey the first time she hits her prey each round. Tanessa can have only one prey designated at a time. Incredible Reload Single Action (Concentrate, Manipulate) Requirement Tanessa has a hand crossbow in each hand; Effect Tanessa quickly juggles her hand crossbows from one hand to another, reloading them both as she does so. Mobile Shot Stance Tanessa's ranged Strikes don't trigger Attacks of Opportunity or other reactions triggered by ranged attacks.
